mapper.select: select writer, content, wdate, likes from (select rownum as rno, writer, content, wdate, likes from (select m.nickname as writer, c.content, c.wdate, c.likes from yomul_comments c, yomul_members m where c.article_no = #{no} and c.wrtier = m.no order by c.no desc) where rownum <= #{perPage} * #{page}) where rownum > #{perPage} * (#{page} - 1)
